text: The group stage of the 2008 CAF Confederation Cup was played from 16 August to 19 October 2008. A total of eight teams competed in the group stage. ==Format== In the group stage, each group was played on a home-and-away round- robin basis. The winners of each group advanced directly to the final. {|class="wikitable" !Key to colours in group tables |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |Group winners advance to the final |} ==Groups== ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width="165"|Team !width="20"|Pld !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|GF !width="20"|GA !width="20"|GD !width="20"|Pts |-bgcolor=#ccffcc |align="left"| CS Sfaxien |6||4||1||1||11||6||+5||13 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| Haras El Hodood |6||3||1||2||10||6||+4||10 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| Club Africain |6||2||2||2||7||6||+1||8 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| Interclube |6||1||0||5||6||16||-10||3 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width="165"|Team !width="20"|Pld !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|GF !width="20"|GA !width="20"|GD !width="20"|Pts |-bgcolor=#ccffcc |align="left"| Etoile Sahel |6||3||1||2||8||6||+2||10 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| Al-Merrikh |6||3||0||3||9||8||+1||9 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| JS Kabylie |6||3||0||3||8||9||-1||9 |-bgcolor= |align="left"| Asante Kotoko |6||2||1||3||7||9||-2||7 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== ==External links== *2008 CAF Confederation Cup - goalzz.com Group stage
